abstracts.cdata!:
As part of the AFC's lending
            program, the project would help finance: over a three-year
            period smallholder farmers' investments in crop
            production; livestock, mainly egg production; and tractors
            and implements. This distribution is based on AFC's
            experience of demand under the first project and expected
            demand for newer activities, such as the herding of swine
            and sheep, poultry farming and fruit growing. The Credit
            also includes provision for financing the agricultural
            credit study and provides funds for the additional
            equipment, technical assistance and training needed by the
            AFC and Ministry of Agriculture to carry out the project.
